entries.name: Age
entries: Prior to Ascension you age normally. After Ascension your aging slows dramatically and lifespans can span millennia.

entries.name: Ascended Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Choose a Subrace
entries: Choose one subrace: Shuriman Ascended, Targonian Ascended, or Darkin.

entries.name: Blessings of the Sun Disc
entries: Choose one blessing (Ascended Fury, Ghost of the Soldier, Life Siphon). Work with your DM to define scaling.

entries.name: Desert Terrain Familiarity
entries: You gain advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks in desert terrain and are not slowed by desert difficult terrain.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Ancient Shuriman and Modern Shuriman.

entries.name: Blessing of the Aspect
entries: Choose one Aspect blessing (Aspect of Destiny, Health, Messenger, or Revelry). Effects are limited-use; consult DM for uses and scaling.

entries.name: Mountainous Terrain Familiarity
entries: You gain advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks in mountainous terrain and are not hindered by difficult terrain there.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Targonian.

entries.name: Blood Magic
entries: As a bonus action you can heal yourself for 1d6 + your Charisma modifier. Once per long rest. Die scales at character levels 5 / 10 / 15 as agreed with DM.

entries.name: Sealed Weapon
entries: You are proficient with your Sealed Weapon. Without a mortal host a Darkin is bound to its weapon.

entries.name: Vengeance of the Darkin
entries: When you score a critical hit with your Sealed Weapon, roll one of the weapon's damage dice one additional time.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Ancient Shuriman and the native language of your mortal host.
